column1: in memory of dallas franklin moore -- parrish funeral home| born: september 12
column3: 2015. this memorial provided by:parrish funeral home
column12: 2015 in secu hospice house in smithfield. born september 12
column13: 1942 in sampson county he was a son of the late james ernest and rosabelle horne moore
column14: sr. dallas was preceded in death by his brothers
column20: mary elizabeth grady. a graveside will be conducted at 2:00 p. m. tuesday
column22: 2015 in sunset memorial park with rev. billy cashwell officiating. the family will receive friends from 1:00 2:00 p. m. at parrish funeral home in selma just prior to the service. surviving are his wife
column23: lois moore of the home; sons
column25: jr. and wife evelyn of smithfield
column26: and joseph graham moore and wife jan of benson; grandchildren
column28: and michael adam moore; three great grandchildren; and five sisters.
